summary: This mod simply adds the ability to take a normal gem and make it flawless with the use of the forge
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][font=Times New Roman][color=#b6b6b6][i]Gem Crafting[/i][/color][/font][i]
[/i][/size]

[size=3]"[/size][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]Have you always hated how hard it is and unrealistic to get a flawless gem from an ore vein? Well then just download this quick mod. I have used it throughout my play-through's and have found it immensely helpful"

This mod simply adds the ability to take a normal gem and make it flawless with the use of the forge.[/size]

[color=#d8d8d8][size=3]                                                       Diamond ------> [i]Flawless[/i] Diamond[/size][/color]
[color=#ff0000][size=3]                                                       Ruby -----------> [i]Flawless [/i]Ruby[/size][/color][size=3]
[color=#351c75]                                                       Amethyst -----> [/color][i][color=#351c75]Flawless[/color][/i][color=#351c75] Amethyst[/color]
[color=#351c75]                                                       [/color][color=#38761d]Emerald ------> [i]Flawless[/i] Emerald [/color][/size]
Gems can now all be turned into [i]Flawless [/i]versions of them.

[size=4]How to:
[/size][size=2]-Go to forge with gems
-Look under MISC Category 
-Craft em [/size]

[size=3]Install:[/size]
-Drop esp into data folder
